body:
I think this is probably something minor, but I'm not sure...

I just tried to spack (v0.8.17-6787-gf9599c177) install python on a macOS computer (10.12.6) and got:

```bash
$ ./bin/spack install python
==> Error: No compilers found for operating system sierra and target x86_64.
If previous installations have succeeded, the operating system may have been updated.
Compilers are defined for the following operating systems and targets:
	elcapitan
Run 'spack compiler find' to add compilers.
```

Anyone else seeing similar issues?
title: Spack install Python fails macOS Sierra
